pageProps.title: Converting .gif to web-safe video formats using ffmpeg
pageProps.description: This post shows how to convert .gif images to web-safe video formats using ffmpeg cli. These formats produce smaller files which means less data to load!

scope.title: Converting .gif to web-safe video formats using ffmpeg
scope.description: This post shows how to convert .gif images to web-safe video formats using ffmpeg cli. These formats produce smaller files which means less data to load!
